title: No North East Line Service Between Chinatown and Farrer Park

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东北线 Chinatown 和 Farrer Park 之间无服务
title_translations.ms: Tiada Perkhidmatan Laluan Timur Laut Antara Chinatown dan Farrer Park
title_translations.ta: சைனாடவுன் மற்றும் ஃபாரர் பார்க் இடையே வடகிழக்கு லைனில் சேவை இல்லை

updates.text: 12:47pm NEL: NEL Services has resumed. Free bus rides have ceased. We are sorry.
11:46am NEL: NEL Svc has resumed. Free Bus ride and Free Bus Bridging Svc still avialable. We are sorry.
11:31am NEL: No NEL Svc btw Chinatown NE4 and Farrer Park NE8. Free Bus Ride and Free Bus Briding Svc at designated Bus stop. We are sorry
